entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: Hermione mentioned that Harry needed time to sneak back into Honeydukes if he wanted to return to school tonight.

entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is the one who asked Minister Fudge what brings him to this neck of the woods.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid was asked by Professor McGonagall if he told the whole pub about Sirius Black.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Minister Fudge mentioned that everyone heard what happened up at the school at Halloween regarding Sirius Black.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall was exasperated and asked Hagrid if he told the whole pub about Sirius Black.

entities.name: minister fudge
entities.description: Minister Fudge is the one who was being questioned by Madam Rosmerta about what brings him to this neck of the woods.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's leg gave a nervous twitch next to Harry.
